document_data.name: Quataris
document_data.mainbody:
'''Quataris''' was an art merchant from the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Well, I am afraid that I am only a purveyor of fine works of art. If you are not a customer of refinement and wealth, then you have no interest in being here, I am sure. Good business to you.''|Quataris}}
document_data.Description: Murtlen was rotund [[human]] male a parchment-white skin.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Quataris's stall could be found shopping in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Center District|Center District]], in [[Waukeen's Promenade]]. His stall was filled with various paintings available for sale.
